However, it's essential to proceed with caution due to the possibility of the signals changing soon and the presence of other vehicles that might be crossing the intersection from various directions, potentially affecting safe passage.

This barrier likely serves a dual purpose of marking out the construction zone and ensuring the safety of the work area by directing vehicles to maintain course in the left lane, steering clear of the roadworks.
